type.description: Button Group type, can be set to default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: 按钮组类型，可设置为默认主信息成功警告危险

size.description: Button Group size, can be set to normal mini small large
size.description_zh: 按键组尺寸，可设置为普通迷你小号大号

mode.description: Button Group mode, can be set to normal text outline icon-container
mode.description_zh: 按钮组模式，可设置为普通文本轮廓图标-容器

vertical.description: Whether to be vertical button group

elevation.description: Elevation of Button Group, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: 按钮组的提升，选项 true false 和 0-24 级

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the button is clicked. Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true
events.description_zh: 单击按钮时触发。加载或禁用状态为 true 时未触发

events.name: touchstart
events.description: Triggered when the button is touchstart, Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true
events.description_zh: 当按钮为触摸启动时触发，当加载或禁用状态为 true 时未触发
